attributes.action: Publicly declare where Government priorities lie
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: How can a petition Objecting to Gypsy Traveller Sites and Non-Payment of Taxes (11 signatories) be worthy of a Government Response when a petition to Abolise the Building of a Mega Mosque 43,000 in support receives no response whatsoever from the Government. YOUR REJECTION INDICATES HOW CORRUPT NEW LABOUR & DEMOCRACY IN THE UK IS.

reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Statements that don't actually request any action
